texts.textentryhtml: Ehrich Galleries, NY; museum purchase with The William Hood Dunwoody Fund, Minneapolis Institute of Arts (1921, accession no. 21.31 (?); sold 1956 to Victor Spark, NY. [Stanley Moss and Co., Riverdale-on-Hudson, NY]; 1987 purchase by Princeton University Art Museum.
